channel.title: Need a good coder
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt] :cool:(delta)Need a good coder(delta) :cool:[/size][/center] IP ADDRESS~Abyssalpkz.no-ip.biz FORUMS~[u]Http://abyssalscape.smfforfree.com/[/u] ~CONTACT INFOMATION~ E-mail~[u]Skaterpunk9091@aim.com[/u] AIM Account(IM me)~Skaterpunk9091
Welcome everyone,my name is James and I need some help with my server.The coder must be pretty good at some stuff I need done.My server is a delta based server,but since I only know some things I need help with others.Rewards will be given if you can fix and do some things i need done.Here is some infomation on what you will be needed to do.
[size=11pt]The Coding[/size] ~As you can see my server is not to great but with your help maybe it could be the next best thing.I am looking for #1 thing is dragon claws!I have always wanted those with a good special with the 4 hit. #1-Dragon claws #2-All teleports go to where the apost to be(varrock,falordor,lumbridge,camolot,and more) #3-Portals(Teleport you to certain places) #4-New commands(like ::rules,::info and some other stuff) #5-New Npc's(Like new monsters we can face) #6-New Quests(Like for d claws or some other thing to do)
[size=11pt]The Rewards[/size] ~The rewards,Ah the best part for you will be soo much.This will all depend on how your coding is and what you can do.You could go from items to cash to staff to hoster!Check out the list of things you could receive and renenber all depends. ~Items(Any were from godswords,bandos,armadyl) ~Coins(Any from 1m-999m) ~Player Mod ~Server Admin ~Forum Mod ~Forum Admin ~Co-Owner ~Hoster/Coder
~You can also recieve Dragon claws and top rewards if you can make dragon claws :eek:.
~I would something like this for Dragon Claws in the server check it out~
[IMG]http://i406.photobucket.com/albums/pp147/burntflamed/DeltaScape0015.png[/img]
[size=11pt] :D :DThanks for looking and please reply i need all the help i can get thanks and have a great day :D :D[/size]

item.title: Need a good coder
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

  1. No advertising.
  2. No rewards.
  3. Learn to program yourself.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/index.html

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good coder
item.dc:creator: @xowner_abyssx xowner abyssx
item.description:
@xowner_abyssx wrote:

[center][size=15pt] (delta)Need a good coder(delta) [/size][/center]
IP ADDRESS~Abyssalpkz.no-ip.biz
FORUMS~Http://abyssalscape.smfforfree.com/
~CONTACT INFOMATION~
E-mail~Skaterpunk9091@aim.com
AIM Account(IM me)~Skaterpunk9091

Welcome everyone,my name is James and I need some help with my server.The coder must be pretty good at some stuff I need done.My server is a delta based server,but since I only know some things I need help with others.Rewards will be given if you can fix and do some things i need done.Here is some infomation on what you will be needed to do.

[size=11pt]The Coding[/size]
~As you can see my server is not to great but with your help maybe it could be the next best thing.I am looking for #1 thing is dragon claws!I have always wanted those with a good special with the 4 hit.
#1-Dragon claws
#2-All teleports go to where the apost to be(varrock,falordor,lumbridge,camolot,and more)
#3-Portals(Teleport you to certain places)
#4-New commands(like ::rules,::info and some other stuff)
#5-New Npcâ€™s(Like new monsters we can face)
#6-New Quests(Like for d claws or some other thing to do)

[size=11pt]The Rewards[/size]
~The rewards,Ah the best part for you will be soo much.This will all depend on how your coding is and what you can do.You could go from items to cash to staff to hoster!Check out the list of things you could receive and renenber all depends.
~Items(Any were from godswords,bandos,armadyl)
~Coins(Any from 1m-999m)
~Player Mod
~Server Admin
~Forum Mod
~Forum Admin
~Co-Owner
~Hoster/Coder

~You can also recieve Dragon claws and top rewards if you can make dragon claws :eek:.

~I would something like this for Dragon Claws in the server check it out~

[size=11pt] :DThanks for looking and please reply i need all the help i can get thanks and have a great day :D[/size]

Read full topic
